original_jd:
Job Description-

This role will blend business acumen with technical proficiency, requiring the ability to understand complex business processes and translate them into effective system configurations. You will be a key player in ensuring our systems accurately reflect business needs and operate efficiently. This position will focus heavily on the developing new processes with technical solutions with the vehicle configuration space. The position will utilize ML and AI to quickly develop solutions.

 • Collaborate with stakeholders across various departments to understand business needs, gather detailed requirements, and document them clearly and concisely using various techniques (e.g., user stories, use cases, process flows). 

• Translate business requirements into technical configurations within our [mention specific system] backend. This includes, but is not limited to:

 • Developing and maintaining configuration specifications.

 • Creating and modifying data mappings and integrations.

 • Implementing and testing new configurations.

 • Troubleshooting and resolving configuration-related issues. 

• Analyze existing data to identify trends, inefficiencies, and areas for improvement. This may involve querying databases, generating reports, and visualizing data using appropriate tools. 

• Identify opportunities to streamline business processes and improve system efficiency through configuration changes and best practices. 

• Thoroughly test configurations to ensure they meet requirements and function as expected. Participate in user acceptance testing (UAT). 

• Maintain comprehensive documentation of system configurations, processes, and troubleshooting steps. 

• Work closely with developers, IT support, and other stakeholders to ensure smooth implementation and ongoing support of system configurations.

Skills Required:

-Strong analytical and problem-solving skills. -Excellent communication, interpersonal, and collaboration skills. -Ability to translate complex technical information into easily understandable terms for non-technical audiences.

Skills Preferred:

-Java experience -SQL experience

Experience Required:

-ML experience and implementation experience

Experience Preferred:

-Experience with Agile methodologies is a plus. -Experience with vehicle configuration is a plus.
enhanced_versions:
Role Overview:
This role is a critical bridge between business operations and technical implementations, requiring a unique blend of business acumen and technical proficiency. As a key member of the team, you will be responsible for understanding complex business processes and translating them into effective system configurations that drive efficiency and accuracy. Your ability to collaborate cross-functionally, analyze data, and identify opportunities for improvement will be instrumental in ensuring our systems seamlessly reflect the evolving needs of the business.

Key Responsibilities:
- Collaborate with stakeholders across various departments to gather detailed requirements, document them clearly, and develop comprehensive configuration specifications
- Implement and maintain technical configurations within our [mention specific system] backend, including data mappings, integrations, and new feature implementations
- Analyze existing data to identify trends, inefficiencies, and areas for optimization, leveraging tools and techniques to generate insightful reports and visualizations
- Proactively identify opportunities to streamline business processes and improve system efficiency through configuration changes and best practices
- Thoroughly test configurations to ensure they meet requirements and function as expected, and participate in user acceptance testing (UAT)
- Maintain detailed documentation of system configurations, processes, and troubleshooting steps to support ongoing operations and future enhancements
- Work closely with developers, IT support, and other stakeholders to ensure smooth implementation and continuous support of system configurations

Required Skills:
- Strong analytical and problem-solving skills to understand complex business processes and translate them into effective technical solutions
- Excellent communication, interpersonal, and collaboration skills to liaise effectively with both technical and non-technical stakeholders
- Ability to translate complex technical information into easily understandable terms for non-technical audiences, ensuring clear and effective knowledge transfer
- Proficiency in SQL to query databases, analyze data, and generate insightful reports

Preferred Skills:
- Experience with Java, providing a solid foundation for understanding and manipulating the underlying [mention specific system] architecture
- Familiarity with Agile methodologies, enabling you to work efficiently in a fast-paced, iterative environment

Required Experience:
- Demonstrated experience in a similar role, blending business and technical expertise to drive system configurations and improvements
- Proven track record of collaborating with cross-functional teams to gather requirements, document processes, and implement technical solutions
- Experience with machine learning (ML) and artificial intelligence (AI) techniques, leveraging these technologies to develop innovative solutions within the vehicle configuration space

Preferred Experience:
- Prior experience in the vehicle configuration domain, providing a deeper understanding of the industry-specific challenges and requirements
- Familiarity with Agile methodologies and their application in a technical environment, enabling you to work effectively in a fast-paced, collaborative setting

Tools & Technologies:
- [Mention specific system] backend configuration
- SQL and data analysis tools
- Machine learning and artificial intelligence platforms
- Collaboration and documentation tools (e.g., Jira, Confluence)

Work Environment & Expectations:
- This role will be primarily office-based, with occasional opportunities for remote work or collaboration with distributed teams
- You will be expected to work closely with cross-functional teams, including business analysts, developers, and IT support, to ensure seamless system configurations and ongoing support
- A proactive, solution-oriented mindset is essential, as you will be responsible for identifying and addressing configuration-related issues and opportunities for improvement

Role Overview:
This is a dynamic and impactful role that combines business acumen, technical expertise, and a passion for driving operational efficiency. As a key member of the team, you will be responsible for bridging the gap between our business requirements and the technical systems that power our operations. By deeply understanding complex business processes and translating them into effective system configurations, you will play a pivotal role in ensuring our [mention specific system] accurately reflects the evolving needs of the organization.

Key Responsibilities:
- Engage with stakeholders across various departments to gather detailed requirements, document them using industry-standard techniques (e.g., user stories, use cases, process flows), and develop comprehensive configuration specifications
- Implement and maintain technical configurations within our [mention specific system] backend, including data mappings, integrations, and new feature implementations, ensuring seamless integration with existing systems
- Analyze existing data to identify trends, inefficiencies, and areas for optimization, leveraging advanced analytical tools and techniques to generate insightful reports and visualizations that drive data-driven decision-making
- Proactively identify opportunities to streamline business processes and improve system efficiency through innovative configuration changes and the adoption of best practices
- Thoroughly test configurations to ensure they meet requirements and function as expected, collaborating with cross-functional teams to conduct user acceptance testing (UAT) and validate the integrity of the system
- Maintain comprehensive documentation of system configurations, processes, and troubleshooting steps to support ongoing operations and enable smooth knowledge transfer
- Serve as a technical liaison between the business and IT teams, effectively communicating complex information to both technical and non-technical stakeholders

Required Skills:
- Exceptional analytical and problem-solving skills, with the ability to break down complex business problems and devise effective technical solutions
- Strong interpersonal and communication skills, enabling you to collaborate seamlessly with cross-functional teams and translate technical details into easily understandable terms
- Proficiency in SQL, with the ability to query databases, analyze data, and generate insightful reports to support data-driven decision-making
- Demonstrated experience in translating business requirements into technical configurations and implementations

Preferred Skills:
- Familiarity with Java, providing a solid foundation for understanding and working with the underlying [mention specific system] architecture
- Experience with Agile methodologies and their application in a technical environment, enabling you to thrive in a fast-paced, iterative setting

Required Experience:
- Proven track record of successfully bridging the gap between business operations and technical systems, with a demonstrated ability to understand complex processes and translate them into effective configurations
- Experience in a similar role, where you have collaborated with cross-functional teams to gather requirements, document processes, and implement technical solutions
- Hands-on experience with machine learning (ML) and artificial intelligence (AI) techniques, leveraging these technologies to develop innovative solutions within the vehicle configuration space

Preferred Experience:
- Prior exposure to the vehicle configuration domain, providing a deeper understanding of industry-specific challenges and requirements
- Familiarity with Agile methodologies and their application in a technical environment, enabling you to work effectively in a collaborative, iterative setting

Tools & Technologies:
- [Mention specific system] backend configuration
- SQL and advanced data analysis tools
- Machine learning and artificial intelligence platforms
- Collaboration and documentation tools (e.g., Jira, Confluence)

Work Environment & Expectations:
- This role will be primarily office-based, with occasional opportunities for remote work or collaboration with distributed teams
- You will be expected to work closely with cross-functional teams, including business analysts, developers, and IT support, to ensure seamless system configurations and ongoing support
- A proactive, solution-oriented mindset is essential, as you will be responsible for identifying and addressing configuration-related issues and opportunities for improvement
- Excellent time management and organizational skills are crucial, as you will be juggling multiple projects and stakeholder demands simultaneously

Role Overview:
This is an exciting opportunity for a technically-adept professional with a strong business acumen to make a significant impact on our organization's operations. As the technical configuration specialist, you will be responsible for bridging the gap between our complex business processes and the [mention specific system] that powers our vehicle configuration capabilities. By deeply understanding the intricacies of our business and translating them into effective system configurations, you will play a pivotal role in driving efficiency, accuracy, and innovation within this critical domain.

Key Responsibilities:
- Collaborate closely with stakeholders across various departments to gather detailed requirements, document them using industry-standard techniques (e.g., user stories, use cases, process flows), and develop comprehensive configuration specifications that align with business needs
- Implement and maintain technical configurations within our [mention specific system] backend, including data mappings, integrations, and new feature implementations, ensuring seamless integration with existing systems and processes
- Analyze existing data to identify trends, inefficiencies, and areas for optimization, leveraging advanced analytical tools and techniques to generate insightful reports and visualizations that inform strategic decision-making
- Proactively identify opportunities to streamline business processes and improve system efficiency through innovative configuration changes and the adoption of best practices, serving as a technical thought leader and change agent within the organization
- Thoroughly test configurations to ensure they meet requirements and function as expected, collaborating with cross-functional teams to conduct user acceptance testing (UAT) and validate the integrity of the system
- Maintain comprehensive documentation of system configurations, processes, and troubleshooting steps to support ongoing operations and enable smooth knowledge transfer
- Serve as a trusted technical advisor, effectively communicating complex information to both technical and non-technical stakeholders and building strong relationships across the organization

Required Skills:
- Exceptional analytical and problem-solving skills, with the ability to break down complex business problems and devise effective technical solutions
- Excellent communication and interpersonal skills, enabling you to collaborate seamlessly with cross-functional teams and translate technical details into easily understandable terms for non-technical audiences
- Proficiency in SQL, with the ability to query databases, analyze data, and generate insightful reports to support data-driven decision-making
- Strong technical aptitude and the ability to quickly grasp and work with the underlying [mention specific system] architecture and configurations

Preferred Skills:
- Hands-on experience with Java, providing a solid foundation for understanding and working with the [mention specific system] backend
- Familiarity with Agile methodologies and their application in a technical environment, enabling you to thrive in a fast-paced, iterative setting

Required Experience:
- Proven track record of successfully bridging the gap between business operations and technical systems, with a demonstrated ability to understand complex processes and translate them into effective configurations
- Experience in a similar role, where you have collaborated with cross-functional teams to gather requirements, document processes, and implement technical solutions
- Hands-on experience with machine learning (ML) and artificial intelligence (AI) techniques, leveraging these technologies to develop innovative solutions within the vehicle configuration space

Preferred Experience:
- Prior exposure to the vehicle configuration domain, providing a deeper understanding of industry-specific challenges and requirements
- Familiarity with Agile methodologies and their application in a technical environment, enabling you to work effectively in a collaborative, iterative setting

Tools & Technologies:
- [Mention specific system] backend configuration
- SQL and advanced data analysis tools
- Machine learning and artificial intelligence platforms
- Collaboration and documentation tools (e.g., Jira, Confluence)

Work Environment & Expectations:
- This role will be primarily office-based, with occasional opportunities for remote work or collaboration with distributed teams
- You will be expected to work closely with cross-functional teams, including business analysts, developers, and IT support, to ensure seamless system configurations and ongoing support
- A proactive, solution-oriented mindset is essential, as you will be responsible for identifying and addressing configuration-related issues and opportunities for improvement
- Excellent time management and organizational skills are crucial, as you will be juggling multiple projects and stakeholder demands simultaneously
- A willingness to take on a leadership role and serve as a technical subject matter expert within the organization is highly desirable
